entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Norfolk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:50 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Delhi 10:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -10.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -13.1°C
Wind: WSW 29 km/h gust 49 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 100 becoming southwest 70 gusting to 110 late this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Erie. Amount 10 cm in snow squalls. Wind southwest 70 km/h gusting to 110 diminishing to 50 gusting to 80 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Erie. Local blowing snow. Amount 15 cm in snow squalls. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
